description: "A late 18th century map of Asia published in London by John Bowles, with regions indicated by colour. Central Borneo is labelled ‘Part inhabited by the Biayos’, which is seen on many contemporary maps, often with the comment ‘a savage people’."
title: "Bowles's   new   one-sheet   map   of   Asia,   divided   into   its   empires,   kingdoms,   states,   and   other   subdivisions   :   laid   down   from   observations   of   the   most   celebrated   geographers"
